item.title: Database Reliability Engineering - My Notes
item.description: Introduction I have been reading excellent Database Reliability Engineering book and below are my notes from it. Key Incentive(s) for Automation Elimination of Toil - Toil is the kind of work tied to running a production service that tends to be manual, repetitive, automatable, tactical, devoid of enduring value, and that scales linearly as a service grows. Important System Characteristics Latency, also known as response time, is a time-based measurement indicating how long it takes to receive a response from a request.

item.title: Using Temporal.io to build Long running Workflows
item.description: Background In a typical business Application, there are often requirements for, Batch processing - Often long running Tasks like data import/export, End of day processing etc. These tasks are often scheduled to be executed at pre-defined interval or on occurance of an Event. Asychronous processing - Tasks, often part of business process / workflow, that can be performed asychronously or offloaded. Such requirements are often fulfilled with custom approaches like batch processing frameworks, ETL Tools or using Queues or specific database features.
